translations: v.放牧；给……铺上草皮（grass 的 ing 形式）

phrs.translation: ◎(牲畜)被放牧在草场上，放牧，放草

sentences.sentence: The actuality of degenerated nature grassland in northern agro-grassing acetone along the line of the great wall was described in this paper.
sentences.translation: 描述了长城沿线农牧交错区天然草场退化现状，指出退化主要原因是干旱少雨、超载放牧、滥垦和不合理利用土地、滥采乱挖。

sentences.sentence: Viticulture : Environment respecting approach to limit the use of chemical products; grassing down to minimize the use of herbicides; partly mechanical and partly manual harvest.
sentences.translation: 种植方式： 合理种植以减少化学药品的使用。留草以减少除草剂使用。采收部分机械部分手工。
